chunk_text: For the general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2015, the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund shall be mobilised to provide the sum of EUR 1 339 928 in commitment and payment appropriations. Article 2 This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union. Done at Strasbourg, 11 March 2015. For the European Parliament The President M. SCHULZ For the Council The President Z. KALNIÃ A-LUKAÃ EVICA (1) OJ L 406, 30.12.2006, p. 1. (2) OJ C 373, 20.12.2013, p. 1. (3) OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 884.
